text: Pam McConnell (1946 - 7 July 2017) was a Canadian politician. She was elected to Toronto City Council in 1994 and most recently served as councillor for Ward 28 from 2000 until her death in 2017. She was born in England. McConnell died on 7 July 2017 of respiratory failure at a hospital in Toronto at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Canada Category:Politicians from Toronto
title: Pam McConnell
